Collisions can be further divided into two outcomes:

entry.title: Cloud Summit 2024 Participation Experience
entry.content:
Overview

Attending Cloud Summit for the first time allowed me to gain a deeper understanding of cloud technologies. I am quite happy to see that the industry has many new tools and technologies that simplify complex tasks, continuously pushing the capabilities of Taiwan’s software industry.

Of course, a speaker who discussed the double-edged nature of the Cloud, highlighting both its advantages and disadvantages. In this era of AI, technological iterations are happening rapidly, but the unchanging principle remains that we must maintain our motivation to learn and embrace new technologies.

Various Exhibitors

The number of booths at this summit, compared to the SRE Conference I attended a few months ago, was overwhelming, with over 40 booths. I believe this is a good thing for two reasons: firstly, it allows everyone to get to know the latest cloud technologies and broaden their horizons; secondly, it might help us introduce these technologies into our future work environments and understand the latest developments. Most importantly for everyone, the gifts from the exhibitors was plentiful. The best item I received was an universal travel adapter (with a 1/9 chance of winning by rolling two red dice).

One exhibitor directly gave me a phone stand and a swipe card without even needing me to fill out any information (maybe they wanted to distribute their goods quickly and head home?).

Upon entering, I rushed through 40 booths to swipe cards to get a pink t-shirt in the afternoon (laugh). The exhibitors were proactive in swiping cards, although some required you to share personal information in exchange for a swipe.

Speech Insights

Exploring the Gradually Lost Technical Skills in the Cloud Native Era

The most recommended topic of this summit was “Exploring the Gradually Lost Technical Skills in the Cloud Native Era” For detailed information, refer to the speaker’s slide link. Here, I want to share my personal reflections.

After listening to the speaker, I couldn’t help but reflect that while technological iterations are an inevitable result of technological progress, are we losing essential developer skills in the process?

Currently, with the rapid development of Cloud and the convenience of Kubernetes (K8S), deploying a complex service has become very easy. This convenience is a benefit but also a drawback, as the speaker mentioned, it’s a double-edged sword. Often, everything works fine, but when issues arise, we might be unable to solve them (YAML often hides some details). The speaker criticized that many might just be YAML engineers. In this era where Cloud is so convenient, one might also be called a Click engineer, deploying complex services with just a few clicks. However, without delving into fundamental knowledge, debugging can be prolonged and misdirected.

Services that used to take months to develop can now be completed in weeks or even a day. This might give supervisors the illusion that any problem should also be resolved within a few days. But as described above, due to the convenience of deployment, our understanding of the underlying logic might be insufficient, leading to unforeseen problems.

This issue also extends to the AI level. When using ChatGPT, we might become lazier, skipping developer documentation and directly asking AI. While this isn’t inherently bad, as natural language queries can save us a lot of time searching for code syntax and quickly acquire knowledge, the days of using Stack Overflow and Google keywords are fading. Today’s engineers can quickly get applicable code but might not understand why it works.

The speaker concluded by emphasizing the importance of fundamental knowledge and continuous learning, such as joining study groups to regularly acquire new knowledge. I strongly agree and believe it remains crucial in this AI era. Fundamental knowledge helps us approach problems from different angles and understand the simplified processes of cloud platforms (one button might execute several scripts).

Experience with Enterprise-level DevSecOps Platform — Enhancing Code Quality and Security Vulnerability Fixes

I have previously heard of DevOps and applied it in workflow, but as information security has gained more attention in recent years, DevSecOps has also become increasingly important among engineers (Sec stands for Security).

Applying this platform in actual work would be very convenient. This product integrates CICD processes with vulnerability scanning and allows registration to replace multiple platform accounts (as it integrates third-party services like GitLab, SonarQube, etc.). The selling point is that it can use AI to fix issues detected by SonarQube, and customization can be done in the YAML file for the degree of fixes. Of course, AI-generated code might still have significant issues, highlighting the importance of “unit testing”, ensuring AI-fixed code passes these tests.

However, this convenient platform somewhat contradicts the previous recommended speech. If a company adopts such a convenient platform, developers still need basic domain knowledge to handle it and avoid being clueless when problems arise.

Conclusion

Recently, our company is also looking to adopt CICD processes, so this summit was a great opportunity to learn new concepts and hear industry perspectives and exchanges. Overall, I found the summit quite rewarding, despite not getting a lunch voucher in the morning (the announcement said to come before 8:30 to get a lunch voucher, but I arrived at 8:15, and the queue was unexpectedly long).

entry.title: Two Ways to Set Up a Firewall in Linux
entry.content:
Firewall Configuration

On Ubuntu Linux, you can use ufw or iptables for firewall configuration. Here are the commands and some pitfalls I encountered along the way. 🤣

UFW

  • View firewall settings
  • Add firewall rules
  • List firewall rules with numbers Example
  • Delete a specific rule
  • Reload rules
  • Enable/disable rules

IPTABLES

If you add a rule for port 22 using ufw, you can verify it with the following commands. However, you should ultimately check sudo iptables -L INPUT -n --line-number to ensure the rule is present.

  • View rules for port 22
    If you added a rule for port 22 using ufw, you can verify it with
  • View input rules
    • Machine 1
    • Machine 2
  • Add input rule
  • Delete input rule

Practical Insights

This post originated because another team at our company experienced a hack due to lack of firewall settings and weak password complexity. To enhance information security, I decided to restrict access to port 22 to a whitelist of IPs. However, I encountered some pitfalls due to unfamiliarity with the commands.

Generally, adding a firewall whitelist should suffice. If you’re not an internal staff member, you shouldn’t be able to access the specific IPs (feel free to share better methods 😆).

On Machine 1, after setting up ufw using:

sudo ufw allow from [IP] to any port 22/tcp

I verified with

sudo iptables -L -n | grep :22

that my IP address was displayed. Therefore, on Machine 1, I could log in using the specific IP, enhancing machine security. However, applying the same method on Machine 2 resulted in issues where I couldn’t log in with my IP (hacker didn’t log in, but I couldn’t either XD).

The main reason was that Machine 2 didn’t apply the ufw rules to iptables. Therefore, no matter how I set up ufw, it didn’t work (or you might need to reinstall ufw).

My final solution was to directly add the whitelist using iptables, ensuring it was written to iptables
sudo iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -s 123.123.123.123 --dport 22 -j ACCEPT

entry.title: It is important for people to take risks, both in their professional lives and their personal lives.
entry.content:
Do you think the advantages of taking risks outweigh the disadvantages?

Risk evaluation is a crucial aspect of decision-making, as uncertainty about the future often leads to feelings of unease and confusion. While some people argue taking risks could have adverse effects on one’s life, others contend that the benefits outweigh the drawbacks. In this essay, I am favor of risk-taking and I will illustrate its pros outweigh its drawbacks.

To begin with, taking risks can significantly impact one’s career path positively. To be specific, stagnant wages and inflation make it essential for individuals to seek opportunities beyond their comfort zones. For example, careers in fields such as software engineering are often sought after for their high pay and prestigious titles. Exploring such career paths allows individuals to discover their potential and maximize their earning potential, especially at a young age.

Furthermore, it is crucial for people to invest stocks or bonds rather than solely relying on savings in the bank for one’s financial plan. Investment is imperative since money can be accumulated by compound interests, which make you fulfill your personal dreams or reach financial goal quickly. Without taking on some level of risk, significant financial gains are unlikely to materialize.

However, there are still some drawbacks in both professional careers and personal lives. Firstly, some people may feel anxious and depressed when stepping out comfort zones. Secondly, the unpredictability of the stock market poses a risk of substantial financial loss. One possible solution to mitigate these risks is to thoroughly research and prepare before making any significant decisions, as knowledge and preparation can help reduce the likelihood of adverse outcomes.

In conclusion, lives are replete of uncertainty and opportunities, urging us to seize chances for better employment and wealth accumulation. I firmly believe prioritizing risk assessment empowers us to navigate these pathways toward a more fulfilling lifestyle.

entry.title: Some children spend hours every day on their smartphones.
entry.content:
Why is this the case? Do you think this is a positive or a negative development?

With the advent of modern technology, kids are inclined to immerse themselves in digital world than ever before. While some people argue that it is beneficial to our children, others contend it could have adverse impacts on their development. I am in favor of the latter, and I will illustrate the root causes and my personal opinion in the essay.

Advanced technology has significantly reshaped human behaviors and lifestyles. Growing up in a digital environment, our children are inclined to spend the majority of their time on electronic devices. Firstly, numerous learning materials and knowledge are conveyed and used via electronic mediums, such as e-books and YouTube videos. Moreover, more and more communities and forums are built on social media, including Facebook, Instagram and TikTok. Children are addicted to these platforms because they want to follow the latest treads and socialize with peers.

In my opinion, obsessing with the screens have several negative effects on humans. To begin with, studies have shown that prolonged usage of mobile phones can contribute to nearsightedness or eye diseases. It is imperative for parents and educators to implement measures for managing screen time to mitigate the risk of these disorders. Furthermore, students who are indulged in smartphones usage may be susceptible to obesity and related health concerns, as lack of physical activities and sedentary lifestyles are among most common health issues worldwide. Last but not least, interpersonal relationships could also be influenced because children are likely to engage with their phones rather than spending quality time with friends.

In conclusion, smartphones have revolutionized various aspects of our lives, including education and social interactions. However, the excessive reliance of youngsters on these devices can have multifaceted consequences, such as vision disorders, obesity, and alienation. I firmly believe that we should restrict children’s phones usage to some extent.

entry.title: In the future all cars, buses, and trucks will be driverless. The only people traveling inside these vehicles will be passengers.
entry.content:
Do you think the advantages of driverless vehicles outweigh the disadvantages?

Self-driving is one of most prevalent technology integrating with artificial intelligence since individuals have always pursed more convenient lifestyles. While some people argue that driverless vehicles have drawbacks, others support their development. I am favor of the latter with three benefits and I will illustrate that pros outweigh its drawbacks in the essay.

On the one hand, self-driving vehicles are beneficial for several reasons. Firstly, multitasking can be realized since people can put more emphasis on their daily routines rather than traffic congestion. It can a have positive impact on commuters since they do not have to waste their time in a tedious traffic jam. Moreover, with the help of machine learning, the best route can be calculated to reduce passengers’ valuable time by autonomous driving system. Last but not least, there would be a decreasing rate of drunk-driving as no one has to drive cars. The government should take measures to promote and subsidize driverless cars since it would lead to fewer criminal rates of alcoholic driving.

On the other hand, it is undeniable that mistakes could still be made by artificial intelligence since its mechanism and training data come from humans. Fear emerges when car accidents occur, which can make people become untrust on self-driving. The problems can be alleviated by investing more research on machine learning or reinforcement learning techniques on autonomous driving system.

In my opinion, drawbacks can be overcome by more funding and diligent research. Individuals can enjoy their journeys and enhance their productivity by autopilots.

In conclusion, self-driving has many advantages, including less wasting time in a traffic congestion, providing the best-route solution, and less drunk-drinking cases. Although the systems are still not perfect nowadays, it could be upgraded and I firmly believe that driverless cars could be dominant in the future vehicle market.

Overall, it is evident that the process commences with consumers disposing of their plastic bottles and concludes with the production of various items for consumers.

Examining the chart more closely, consumers dump their plastic bottles into a giant collection bin, designed to gather recyclable materials. entry.title: In some cultures, children are often told that they can achieve anything if they try hard enough.
entry.content:
What are the advantages and disadvantages of giving children this message?

The education of children is crucial since their personalities and characteristics are typically formed at a young age. Some parents instill in their children the belief that anything can be accomplished through dedication. I am in favor of this concept and will illustrate its pros and cons in the essay.

To begin with, children may develop a positive attitude towards life. They would understand that talented individuals do not always succeed; success often comes to those who are diligent and have good time management. For instance, if children struggle with their academic scores, parents and teachers can teach them how to learn intelligently and memorize efficiently, encouraging them to explore different study methods and achieve their goals. Studies have shown that those who believe in their potential ability to complete complicated tasks are inclined to lead a healthier mental life.

In terms of drawbacks, sometimes reality does not align with one’s expectations. There are various paths to success, and the point is that children may not easily know how to reach the finish line without the necessary resources. More specifically, wealthy parents often provide their children with higher education and funds; therefore, their kids tend to have massive opportunities to succeed without much effort. This often creates a disparity that most children cannot compete with, leading to adverse impacts such as anxiety and depression resulting from setbacks and failures.

In my opinion, this message would not hinder one’s success as one has enough inner ability to confront the setbacks. Parents should help their children to build more confidence to cope with unsettling situations.

In conclusion, children are highly susceptible to the education they receive from their parents or teachers. It is essential to help them develop a positive mindset and provide a nurturing environment to combat negative feelings. Those who embrace this concept are more likely to start their own businesses or achieve success in the future.

entry.title: Some people say that advertising is extremely successful at persuading us to buy things. Other people think that advertising is so common that we no longer pay attention to it.
entry.content:
Discuss both these views and give you own opinions.

Advertisement is ubiquitous since our lives are packed with different pop-up ads and advertising videos. While some people contend that advertisement is beneficial to companies, others claim that it does not create any marginal values. This essay will discuss both viewpoints and argue in favor of the former.

On the one hand, ads represent powerful and useful marketing strategies, contributing to exposures and revenue. It is undeniable that successful products are usually promoted through advertisement or celebrity endorsements. For instance, Uber Eats has enlisted a renowned online influencer as their brand ambassador to enhance its presence online and drive new traffic and sales. Moreover, some companies leverage Meta and Google Ads to display relevant banner ads on our browsers to increase more popularity. This can have positive impacts on purchases since potential consumers may be attracted by its appealing ads.

On the other hand, more exposures do not necessarily lead to more purchasing behavior and sometimes it could have an adverse impact. More specifically, when a Facebook user unintentionally click an advertisement, the recommendation system generates more related ads to pop up repeatedly, which can sometimes be annoying and obnoxious. This not only leaves a negative lasting impression on consumers but it usually makes users to ignore advertisements.

From my perspective, embracing ads has brought plenty of benefits to its revenue. The adverting providers, such as Facebook and Google, need to improve their recommendation systems and algorithms to meet the market demands.

In conclusion, although our daily lives are full of various ads and sometimes annoying. It is possible that advertisement can genuinely benefit companies and significantly boost product sales. I firmly believe that the pros outweigh its cons.

entry.title: In the future, nobody will buy printed newspapers or books because they will be able to read everything they want online without paying.
entry.content:
To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?

Newspapers and books are vital media worldwide, serving as essential conduits for the latest information and valuable knowledge. With the advent of advanced technology, the potential long-term replacement of printed papers by online reading is evident. In my view, I favor this shift, and I will illustrate two primary advantages in this essay.

First and foremost, online reading can positively impact the environment. There is no doubt that paper usage would decline as more people adopt e-books or access information on the Internet. This reduction in paper consumption translates to fewer trees being cut down, preserving our forests and enhancing the transformation of carbon dioxide into oxygen. In the current era, with a growing emphasis on eco-friendly products, many believe this is a crucial step in addressing global warming.

Moreover, electronic books and online news offer more efficient means of dissemination and permanent storage. Unlike printed newspapers, which provide yesterday’s information, online news always offers real-time data. For example, sharing a website link by tapping on an iPhone facilitates the rapid spread of videos or messages. Additionally, the traditional process of book publishing, involving printing, cover creation, and transportation to various bookstores, is time-consuming. In contrast, e-books can be published more swiftly, leading to cost savings for consumers seeking knowledge. Furthermore, e-books can be stored indefinitely, whereas printed books are susceptible to moisture, dirt, or insects.

In conclusion, the promotion of online reading is justified due to several main advantages, including its environmentally friendly impact, efficient information dissemination, and long-term preservation. It is plausible that in the future, numerous e-books and online news sources will replace traditional printed ones.

entry.title: In some countries, owning a home rather than renting one is very important for people.
entry.content:
Why might this be the case?
Do you think this is a positive or negative situation?

Residential accommodation is a critical aspect of modern society, as it addresses the fundamental need for shelter. The debate between renting an apartment and owning a house is a common discussion. In my personal view, owning a house has several positive impacts due to factors such as cost considerations and the symbolic importance of establishing a family. This essay will delve into these underlying reasons and present my perspective on the matter.

Cost is one of the most primary reasons. Specifically, renting a flat is not a sustainable long-term residential solution. First, apartment costs may fluctuate due to inflation, as some of landlords may escalate expenditures yearly or even monthly, which can have adverse impacts on those facing financial hardships. Second, when landlords decide to cease renting their properties, most tenants are left with no alternative but to leave. This not only results in additional expenditures but also requires a substantial amount of time devoted to the moving process.

Another major contributing factor is the symbolic importance of establishing a family. In certain regions, creating a family is deemed a crucial and pivotal stage in individuals’ lives. The procession of a home signifies independence and maturity, demonstrating one’s ability to care for others, particularly for those intending to have kids. For instance, in Chinese traditional concept, some parents incline towards leaving real estate to their children because they typically consider their kids.

In my opinion, owning their house possession has positive impacts for two reasons. First and foremost, renting cost might be stable since everyone tend to have their houses. Second, purchasing a house is definitely a large amount of one’s expenditure and also a dream; therefore, youngsters may be more diligent and save more funds for the future.

In conclusion, the cost of renting and the desire to building a family are the two primary reasons for valuing owing a house. This can affect positively towards our renting market and attitude working hard. Each house is a testament to our commitment to a prosperous and meaningful life.

entry.title: A rise in the standard of living in a country often only seems to benefit cities rather than rural areas.
entry.content:
What problems can this cause?
How might these problems be reduced?

The gap between urban cities and countryside has become a critical issue, leading to the increase of economic and social inequality, which can have adverse impacts on our long-term development. In this essay, I will illustrate the underlying reasons and offer some viable solutions on it.

Rural-urban disparities is one of the most primary reasons. Specifically, urban areas are often equipped with advanced infrastructure and facilities, including gyms, pubs and department stores. These allow citizens to relax and unwind after a long working hours. For instance, London is the largest capital city worldwide, which is also one of the most prominent financial and political places. With rising living standard, people can benefit from healthcare, education, and transportation. One possible approach is that governments should prioritize the investment in rural infrastructure, including roads, schools and technology, to improve the overall quality of life in these areas.

Another major contributing factor is job opportunities. Cities provides more higher-paid jobs, which attract tens of thousands of youngsters from rural areas. Moreover, there are lots of prestigious universities and advanced manufacturing or companies in cities. The problem can be alleviated by subsidizing funds to these academic institutions and well-known cooperation to invest in rural areas. Take TSMC for an example, one of the most state-of-the-art semiconductor companies in the world. Many countries had invited the company to invest in their rural areas since TSMC need a lot of areas for factories and human resources with high techniques, which can definitely empower the local population and encourage its prospect.

In conclusion, it is inevitable that a rise in the standard of living, it is likely to benefit cities rather than rural areas due to rural-urban disparities and job opportunities. However, with correct and appropriate measures, it is possible to mitigate the impact of the issue.

entry.title: Students should focus on learning in the classroom rather than show their status by wearing fashionable clothes. Therefore, all students have to wear school uniforms.
entry.content:
Do you agree or disagree with this statement?

Wearing uniforms is one of the most unforgettable memories, representing our hardworking periods, energetic adolescence, and vibrant students’ life. While some individuals argue that students have the right to choose what they wear, opponents contend that wearing uniforms should be mandated. I wholeheartedly support the latter and I will provide three compelling reasons in this essay.

To begin with, wearing uniforms minimizes distractions and helps students maintain better focus on their academic performance. It is undeniable that primary goals of students are to learn, discover and explore different knowledge during school. If they pay too much attention on their appearance, the importance of their assignment or coursework may be overlooked. With this measure, the possibility of inappropriate clothes is less likely to appear in campus since students have to wear uniforms instead of their own styles.

Moreover, school security is another prominent issue that needs consideration. Students wearing uniforms serve as symbolic of the school, making it easier for security guards to recognize the students’ identification. To be specific, malicious individuals and criminals have difficulties to invade the campus if they wear normal clothes.

Last but not least, wearing uniforms fosters a sense of honor and a feeling of belonging to school. For instance, sometimes students are proud of themselves if they are in a prestigious institution, which means that their hardworking, persistence and intelligence in academic exams.

In conclusion, there are numerous benefits for students to wear uniforms, including focusing on their studies, school security, honor and the sense of belonging. It is imperative that every school should adopt uniform policies for these reasons.

entry.title: Some people hesitate between getting a job and starting their own business. While the idea of not having a boss and working on one's own schedule may sound tempting, financial risks and stress sometimes outweigh these advantages.
entry.content:
In your opinion, what are the pros and cons of working in a company?

It is debatable that whether one should embrace employment or embark on entrepreneurship, particularly for recent graduates. While some people argue that job stability and lower risk make employment an attractive choice, opponents contend that starting a business is more rewarding. Personally, I support the former and I will discuss both of advantages and drawbacks.

On the positive side, employees bear less risk compared to entrepreneurs. For entry-level workers, concerns related to operating funds, human resources, and management are not paramount since they are neither chief executive officer (CEO) nor members of the board of directors. Despite potential unsatisfactory performance, majority of companies ensure that fixed monthly salaries and essential welfares. Moreover, employees are typically safeguarded by employment laws, preventing from vicious bosses and inappropriate demands. If one struggles with the company culture, they can easily explore other career options without significant opportunity costs.

On the contrary, excessive working hours pose a primary drawback, which can have detrimental impacts on individuals’ health and work-life balance. Certain professionals are compelled to exceed the standard 40-hour workweek, surpassing the average working hours. For instance, chefs and waiters are mandated to consistently work beyond 8 hours, especially during continuous holiday periods. Recent research has shown that prolonged periods without adequate relaxation can lead to both mental and physical health issues. This concern is particularly unsettling in occupations such as bus drivers and pilots, where excessive working hours could jeopardize public safety and lead to catastrophic consequences.

In conclusion, choosing between being an employee or an entrepreneur involves weighing various factors, including risk and management of working hours. It is crucial to carefully consider the pros and cons when opting for one’s career path.

entry.title: Forests produce fresh oxygen and participate in regulating climate. But every year the tree cover of our planet decreases due to deforestation.
entry.content:
What are the primary causes of deforestation?
To what results may it lead?

Justify your opinion with relevant examples.

Nowadays the number of trees or plants are continuously decreasing year after year, which has adverse impacts on our living environment. More and more people should be educated to have a common sense about deforestation and its consequences. This essay will delve into the primary reasons behind this issue and subsequently outline its potential effects.

From my own perspective, the foremost cause of deforestation is the expansion of residential areas. It is undeniable that the cost of living in urban areas is constantly rising due to the inflation and the price of raw materials; thus, both manufacturing and the government have no choice but to develop the farmland and greenery. Moreover, wood can be applied to many aspects, including paper, furniture and houses. Some of the trees are valuable, durable and rare resources, some of which made for wooden furniture, such as tables, chairs and doors due to their higher price.

The possible effects of this issue include the loss of biodiversity and exacerbation of global warming. First of all, the destruction of forests and jungles has negative impacts on our planet since some species may lose their habitats, resulting in their extinction. For instance, a study indicated that deforestation in Amazon has severe consequences for the biodiversity, putting various creatures at risk. Secondly, forests play a vital role as the Earth’s lungs since plantations convert carbon dioxide to oxygen, providing the fresh air for all livings. Without them, it will definitely accelerate the rate of global warming, contributing to rising sea levels and extreme weather conditions.

In conclusion, deforestation is resulted from human activities and higher economic value of trees, leading to the loss of biodiversity and climate change. It is imperative that all individuals should cooperate to alleviate the impact of this environmental challenge.

entry.title: Plagiarism in academics has become a pressing problem in many countries today.
entry.content:
What are the causes of this problem?
What are some possible solutions?

It is common that the standard graduation of higher education is paper-writing and research. An upward trend of plagiarism in academics has been observed in recent years, which has adverse impacts on educational aspects. In this essay, I will illustrate the underlying reasons for plagiarism and offer some viable solutions on it.

Desire to reach higher scores is one of the most primary reasons for encouraging one to copy texts from others’ dissertations. Those who give exceptional performance on academics might have opportunity for scholarships application to afford one’s tuition fees. One possible approach is that enhancing the difficulties of requirements, including multiple professions co-censoring, peer reviewing and importing plagiarism checking system. Not only does it definitely lessen the frequency of copying, but it improves the importance on heightened academic’s awareness, which will also increase the credibility and reliability on research.

Another major contributing factor in plagiarism is procrastination or poor time management. Students might not realize that the deadline of coursework and put less emphasis on education. Some may focus on their hobbies, and some even have to earn adequate funds to support their studies; however, these might lose the importance of researching and leads to procrastination of doing assignments. This problem can be alleviated by instructing correct time concepts and requiring on several splitting parts of deadline on theses, as this would make students complete it on schedule.

In conclusion, plagiarism is a serious, tricky and difficult problem relating to many aspects, such as the aspiration of excellent grades and procrastination. However, with correct and appropriate measures, it is possible to mitigate the impact of the issue.

entry.title: The government should sometimes infringe on people's freedom for the security of society.

Nowadays, liberty and freedom are fundamental and paramount values that we cherish. While some people contend that personal freedom should remain inviolable from government interference. However, I firmly disagree with this viewpoint and I will illustrate with two compelling instances in the essay.

First and foremost, public welfare sometimes takes precedence over individual rights. In term of crisis, the government might have no choice but to infringe on one’s privacy or liberty. Take coronavirus as an example, severe pandemic has ravaged for the past three years, majority of individuals worldwide have tested positive for Covid-19. The authorities took measures to mitigate the impacts of the virus, including implementing mandatory mask-wearing regulations, enforcing limitations at national borders; however, contact tracing raised concerns as it intruded upon individuals’ privacy. Individuals testing positive had to undergo quarantine or isolation from others due to public hygiene factor. Moreover, spreading false or misleading information should be curtailed because it may have adverse impact on those who can not easily tell apart true or false.

In addition, social safety is important. Some individuals may not take law enforcements or other’s freedom seriously, which can be a potential menace for jeopardizing other’s life. Firstly, the information of violent or sexual assault criminals or murderers should be revealed to public after confirming the criminal facts by authorities. Also, they should be sentenced to life imprisonment for serious offenses. Second, those who have drunk-driving should be revoked their licenses, which can improve the road safety.

In conclusion, governments have the right to invade one’s freedom when in an emergency or to reduce the crime rates. For these reasons, it is possible that to achieve a healthier, safer and peaceful community.

entry.title: Establishing good relationships in the workplace is not important, as the primary goal of every person is to focus on work.
entry.content:
To what extent do you agree with this statement?

It is undeniable that companies are profitable oriented places, aiming for higher revenue or prestigious fame. Some people argue that the most critical goal for employees is to solely concentrate on work. However, I do not agree with this and I will provide two compelling reasons in this essay.

To begin with, projects could be completed more smoothly with better relationships. Some projects need the cooperation of individuals and huge funds. For instance, building a credit predicting system with artificial intelligent in bank requires various departments, such as credit card department, technological support team and so on. If they have good relationships, it is possible that the system could be established more rapidly and the company could benefit in short time. Moreover, huge projects often require team work and continue at least several months; thus, it is difficult to focus only on just work without building a relationship with other colleagues.

On top of that, better working vibe may enhance the productivity. Without the doubt, environment has a substantial impact on one’s mental and physical health. Studies have shown that working in a team with good relationships not only fosters employees’ efficiency, but also has a positive correlation with a company’s revenue. Take Google as an example, the cooperation offers their employees with facilities, such as gym, café and canteen, allowing them to have a flexible time communicating with others colleagues. Furthermore, team building culture is also a popular concept, which encourages the employees to interact with each other, creating more exceptional ideas or projects.

In conclusion, companies should not focus only on their profits because establishing good relationships have potential benefits, such as tasks can be done more smoothly or better working vibe helps the productivity. It is worthy that the companies should put more emphasis on the team relationship rather than just focusing on work.

entry.title: In many countries there is a shortage of suitable people for essential jobs. What do you think are the causes of this problem and what measures could be taken to solve it?
entry.content:
Nowadays, several nations have experienced a workforce shortage for necessary jobs, such as cleaner, farmer, and waiter. Without these kinds of labor, it might have an adverse impact on the development of the country. In this essay, I will illustrate the underlying reasons for staff shortages and offer some viable solutions on it.

The gap between essential occupations and professional careers often results from differences in educational levels. Those who have a higher academic background tend to be a knowledge worker rather than a manual or unskilled labor. Moreover, the proportion of individuals with bachelor’s or master’s degrees is higher than ever before, resulting in a large population of highly educated students. One possible approach is the raising the basic wage to attract more potential workers for necessary jobs. However, one drawback for increasing the budget is that it may lead to price hikes in daily commodities affecting personal expenses.

Another major contributing factor in staff shortage is excessive working hours. This not only makes lower quality of jobs but affects one’s mental and physical health. Policies should be implemented such as shifting systems to reduce it, although this would definitely require a larger workforce.

The third, and perhaps most important factor is low salary. Offering minimum wage may not be sufficient to attract the workforce in developed countries; thus, our authorities should consider employing more foreigner workers from other nations to address the shortage issue. This problem can be alleviated by hiring more foreigner workers, as the basic wage might be higher than in these developing countries.

In conclusion, shortage workforce for essential jobs is tricky and difficult problem relating to many aspects, such as education levels, excessive working hours and low salary. However, with correct and appropriate policies, it is possible to mitigate the impact of the issue.

entry.title: A lot of people have become dependent on technology as it plays a big role in our daily lives.
entry.content:
Do you agree that living in the computer age has more advantages than disadvantages? Describe the positive and negative impacts of technology on our lives and give your opinion.

Modern technology has played a crucial role in our daily lives, such as computers and mobile phones. These bring us convenience, creativity and economical effects, which is difficult to imagine living without these cutting age technologies. This essay examine the upsides and downsides of computer age.

In terms of advantages, learning can be easier than before. First, various genres of programs are provided on YouTube, where children can experience culture differences, gain abundant knowledge, and learn a second language. For instance, BBC offers meaningful and educational programs and Discovery Channel is a popular source for observing wild animals. Second, these programs are digital recorded, which can be replayed at any time or anywhere without limitation. Moreover, children no longer bring heavy printed books because this educational knowledge can be stored in lightweight iPads. Thus, it is possible that reducing the carbon dioxide by utilizing these tools.

However, improper using technology has adverse impacts on individuals or even society. Recent studies have implied that our younger generation is addicted to Instagram or TikTok, where they waste time because pursing just more likes or spotlights. It is undeniable that these kinds of platforms have distracted us, which make us spend less time on our families or friends. Furthermore, misinformation as well as fake news is full on the Internet and there are more and more cyber issues in recent years such as hacking, phishing and Internet fraud. Governments or authorities should take measures to tackle these problems or discuss with the specialists to mitigate the impacts. For instance, anyone who spread misinformation should be sent into jails. For personal aspect, setting a time restriction on apps would be an efficient way to manage the time.

In conclusion, there are several benefits on computers and mobile phones, such as learning educational programs, experiencing culture or wild animals. Nevertheless, technology has its drawbacks on misinformation, addiction or scam. If we utilize these tools well, in my opinion, I believe the pros can /will outweigh its drawbacks.

entry.title: In their advertising, business nowadays usually emphasize that their products are new in some way. Why is this?
entry.content:
Do you think it is a positive or negative development?

Compelling advertisements typically catch everyone’s attention. Not only can they attract potential consumers to purchase, but they can provide the organization with greater incentive to develop new merchandise. In my opinion, it is positive development for our advertisements.

People naturally tend to prefer novelty than the familiar. Advertisements strategically leverage this inclination to improve their visibility among potential consumers because it will boost the appeal and popularity of products. Mark Zuckerberg, the founder of Meta, has released the latest application of social media, Thread, which is a text-oriented application distinct from Instagram. It appealed more than 1 million people, who registered for the service within just an hour. The registration speed surpassed that of ChatGPT, astonishing countless individuals.

Another aspect is that the company’s commitment to developing more innovate products to meet diverse demands, fostering creativity and convenience for users. To illustrate, Apple unveiled the Dynamic Island feature on iPhone 14 Pro series models, elevating the interactive touch capabilities in this compact region compared to its previous state. Moreover, Apple collaborated with third-party platforms like Spotify and Youtube, users can experience heightened functionality when interacting with these apps through the Dynamic Island.

For instance, the iPhone 15 series has adopted type-C charging cables, but I believe this compliance with EU regulations should have been implemented earlier.

entry.title: A lot of places in the world rely on tourism as a main source of income. Unfortunately, tourism can also be a source of problems if it is not managed correctly.
entry.content:
Describe the advantages and disadvantages of tourism in the modern world. Do you think that benefits of tourism outweigh its drawbacks?

Traveling has recovered and become more popular after three years of severe pandemic or coronavirus. Some people assert tourism can have adverse impact on the environment. However, I do not agree with this and I will illustrate several compelling reasons for supporting the benefits of tourism outweigh its drawbacks.

Tourism boosts the economy. In many countries, it is evident that tourism indeed brings tens of thousands of visitors annually and the governments make profits from it. Human resources are essential key factors for the tourism, such as the waiters in the restaurants, the cleaners in the hotels and the ground crew in the airports. With such substantial demands, local companies can offer more higher salary for their employees. Moreover, tourists from wealthy countries can purchase more products which can help local people earn extra money.

Furthermore, traveling abroad not only opens our horizon but gives us more concerns on historical sites. First, experiencing local culture or customs is an amazing and unforgettable memory when flying to another country. For example, drinking beers with fired chicken is a popular trend in Korea when hanging out with friends. Second, lots of historical tourist attractions are preserved well because of money flow from tourists.

However, it is undeniable that more and more tourists cause earth-shattering consequences. Some people throw away plastic waste or trash to the mountains. Recently, a lot of visitors came to Mountain Fuji and left bunch of junks, which had negative impacts on the environment. Simultaneously, excessive visitors make the area crowded and noisy and affect local transportation. Governments should take measures to address the issues and regulate laws to protect the environment. In my opinion, these difficulties can be overcome with appropriate policy or laws, so they are not huge problems.

In conclusion, tourism can boost a country’s economy with job opportunities, product-selling. It also provides several benefits like opening one’s horizon and putting more emphasis on historical sites. Nevertheless, authorities should take actions to prevent the environment from vicious tourists’ destruction. It can benefit people and reduce the effect of its drawbacks by appropriate measures and I believe that the pros outweigh the cons.

entry.title: The diagram show the recycling process of aluminum cans.
entry.content:
The diagram below illustrates the several stages of how to recycle aluminum cans.

Overall, it is evident that the process commences with disposing of the used cans and ends with manufacturing containers with reusing material.

Initially, used cans are thrown away into the trash bins then collected and sent to the special center which is particularly dealing with these containers for recycling. The aluminum cans are cleaned and sorted first, because they may be filthy and inappropriate for reusing. Subsequently, they are shredded and compressed by a sophisticated recycling machine. After completing the stage, the aluminum cans are heated and melted into the form of liquid, which is the raw material for reusing.

The liquid is rolled out to the thickness of between 2.5mm to 6.mm, and it is ready to apply the ingredients into producing the containers. The recycling products are used into various containers, such as drinks cans or foods jars, which are quite often seen in the supermarkets or convenience stores. In the UK, Coke Cola cans are made up of 74 percent recycled material.

entry.title: Some people say that the main environmental problem of our time is the loss of particular species of plants and animals. Other say that there are more import environmental problems.
entry.content:
Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

Environmental concerns have undeniably risen to the forefront of global issues in recent times. While some individuals emphasize the significance of the loss of specific species as the primary environmental challenge, others contend that there exist more critical problems warranting our immediate attention. In this essay, I will delve into both perspectives and present my own viewpoint.

Animals and plants play pivotal roles in our ecosystem. Their absence would lead to a loss of biodiversity, severely impacting the environment. Most plants are essential for carbon dioxide to oxygen conversion, a critical process for numerous Earth inhabitants. Moreover, certain animal species may become extinct due to the rising of sea levels, resulting in the destruction of its biodiversity, and thus, the disruption of food chains. Some fish or plants may disappear from our dining table and some farmers or fishermen may lose their livelihoods.

On the other hand, these environmental problems have direct and significant consequences for humans, making them more urgent and critical than the loss of biodiversity. First, air pollution has severe impacts on the individuals’ health, resulting in the disease or even cancer in cities such as Beijing. Second, rising sea levels affect island nations, forcing residents to leave their homes. Last but not least, improper disposal of plastic waste and trash not only fosters the proliferation of insects but makes our cities filthy or unsanitary.

In conclusion, though the loss of specific species is a significant environmental concern, issues such as air pollution, rising sea-level, and improper waste disposal have more immediate and direct impacts on humanity. It is vital that we prioritize environmental protection to safeguard not only biodiversity but our own well-being.

entry.title: 關於我參加軟體工程師的專題班的那些事
entry.content:
前言

這故事要提到我的職涯計畫，以前是在金融業做 Data Scientist 和 RPA (Robotic Process Automation)，那時候也有開發一些全端的網站應用。而當我接觸網站開發的那一刻起，我心中就對這塊充滿好奇心。

當時，我提出以儀表板方式呈現各部門使用 RPA 的情況，並簡單地進行了一個概念驗證（POC）。當主管看到這個儀表板時，對此印象深刻，甚至還請旁邊的其他同事來評估我所開發的網站。那時候，我內心充滿了成就感，也因此對轉向網站開發產生了興趣。

我平常使用的語言是 Python，開發的框架大多是 Flask、FastAPI 並搭配 Postgres。為了加深自己對於網站開發的技能，也對於現行軟體課程評估了一番，最後決定參加六角學院的軟體工程師企業專題班。

關於課程

課程主要使用 Node.js 搭配 Mongo DB 開發，這兩個也是我沒有接觸過的技術，下定決心要好好新技術，提升自己的職涯競爭力。

這個課程主要是完成專題為導向，大致上可以列出四點：

  • 約三個月完成網站開發專案
  • 從零開始規劃網站線稿圖
  • 短時間內學習新技術
  • 與其他工程師遠端協作

我想額外提到，每週五會有線上直播課程，每週一與專題教練對齊開發進度。由於課程的技術也會應用到專題上，因此也會更有動力在每週五晚上去聽老師的課程。而週末就會進行衝刺開發，也是為了在禮拜一可以跟教練同步我們做的進度。

專案簡介

我們的專案名稱是「超人幫手」，座右銘是「讓您在生活中擁有超人的力量」。我們希望提供一個平台，讓使用者可以輕鬆地找到需要幫助的任務。同時，我們也希望讓使用者感受到自己像超人一樣有能力去幫助別人解決問題，實現自我價值的提升。

Live Demo ：https://superhandy-frontend.zeabur.app/

GitHub Backend：https://github.com/erik1110/SuperHandy-backend

GitHub Frontend：https://github.com/erik1110/SuperHandy-frontend

綜上所述，這是一個任務媒合系統，提供需求者「案主」與提供者「幫手」進行媒合。而我們開發的時候有四大功能：

    1. 地圖搜尋任務
    1. 技能評價
    1. 聊天室
    1. 會員點數加值

關於小組

我們組有五位工程師，後端包含我有兩位，前端有三位，我覺得我們組的開發效率、遠端協作與雙向溝通都很不錯。

平時我們在禮拜三、日的晚上會有小組大會議，這是大家一起參與，而這時候聚焦在整個專案的里程碑。例如前期一起規劃網站的架構、中期討論網站的大功能、後期討論前後端 API 介接的開發進度等等。

而後端會議通常會在日下午，有點算是晚上的會前會，我們會彼此討論後端的進度或是需要協助的部份。因此我自己盡量將份內的進度壓在日下午以前完成。

開會方式透過 Discord 的語音聊天，如下圖

(後端搞小圈圈還開一個後端小屋 🤣)

選擇技術

每個人時間都有限，大家平常也都需要上班，因此我們列出這次專題可能會用到的技術列表，每個人都會對想學的技術進行評分點數(一個點數為 4 個小時)，最後加總的點數大約落在 15 上下，代表這段時間可以學習的技術點數。(很像小時候玩線上遊戲，一開始的技術點數不太足夠，我們只能投資最想要的部分)

如下圖，這次我以學習 Node.js 、規劃資料庫環境為主，其他次要的包含第三方登入、金流串接和部署雲端。

經濟學課本的第一句話：「資源有限，慾望無窮」，想要在短時間內完成多個技術學習難上加難，還可能會鼯鼠五技，不如在一開始先圈列好最想要的技能，並且透過量化方式來評估自己的時間可以事半功倍。

規劃 API

終於來到規劃 API 的階段，透過線稿圖去構思可能會有哪些功能。這時候列出表格相當重要，首先教練希望就登入、使用者帳號先做好，因此在列出的同時，也可以同步開發。

基本上欄位至少需要包含角色、頁面群組、 API 名稱、API 路徑、方法，其他欄位是依照我們專案需求，例如進度、優先度等等。

在規劃 API 的同時，我們也同步列出 Mongo DB 的 collection

開發階段

前面紙上談兵告一段落，接下來進入實戰階段啦😆 我們大概從五月中旬陸續開發，後端可以先從建立 MongoDB 和 Swagger Docs 開始，熟悉 Node.js 的寫法著手。這邊要提到的是如果平常每週的直播課有跟著，並且寫回家作業的話，ㄧ開始使用 Express 建立 Node.js 會很快上手。

而後端的任務，就是將 API 列表中逐一實現到 Swagger Doc

後端開發功能大概的依序是：

  • 登入註冊寄信
  • 使用者資訊
  • 首頁
  • 刊登任務
  • 找任務
  • 系統通知
  • 聊天室
  • 金流串接
  • 第三方登入

這個階段教練檢核標準基本上是要看兩個角色是否可以進行互動，以我們專案需求來說，我們設計的任務系統包含「幫手」接任務、「案主」接任務。因此大致上我們完成到第五點就是本專案最主要的功能，後續 6～9 點是加分功能。由於開發時間有限，主要功能如果沒有先開發好，就算有加分功能也是白搭。

而我認為這次專案最難的地方也就是刊登任務，我們的需求是要做需求單據的系統，其中單據會有相當多種的狀態，並且還會有草稿區、下架模式。

補充說明，其實在前一個階段，我們也將這個考慮並著手規劃以下表格。而這張表也是要跟全組一起共同討論，因為這也關係到前端要怎麼呈現畫面。由於我們先定義好每個 status 的意義，在寫刊登任務相關功能就可以按照這張表進行開發。

協作工具

下圖是我們有利用到的協作工具，而專案簡報是使用 Canvas。

心得分享

經過這次的專案開發，除了認識一群工程師們好朋友，我們也完成很棒的 side project，讓我有滿滿的收穫和成就感。由於在每次與教練進度會議的時候，提前加入會議亦可以看到其他組的進度。有些其他組的組員可能剛好公司專案進行就會比較沒有時間開發、常常加班或是特殊情況，導致進度上較為落後。因此我真的很感謝組員們各各很罩，大家的進度都非常神速，也會互相 cover 和講幹話。

另外我想提到的是，平常上班都這麼辛苦了，為什麼大家下班還要進修並增進技術呢？我認為有兩點：

    1. 時間規劃：有多少人會記得在每年年初自己訂下的目標，而年底的時候能真的完成與實踐呢？我覺得能做到這點的人不多。因此，參加一門規劃好的課程，依照進度按表操課，並且有一群夥伴互相提醒切磋，我認為是相當不錯的方式。
    1. 提升自我：大家無非是想要提升技術，更重要的是提升職場競爭力，未來在面試時可以拿出 side project。透過實際去開發作品來應用技術，這些技能才會是自己的看家本領和真功夫。

It is undeniable that as individuals age, their bodies become more susceptible to illness, disease, or even cancer. Access to quality healthcare is a crucial concern worldwide, especially given the prevalence of sedentary lifestyles and poor dietary habits. Some people are drawn to alternative treatments; however, there are potential drawbacks to this approach that deserve consideration. In this essay, I will illustrate the underlying reasons on it.

Doctor undergo rigorous training and possess extensive professional knowledge in the field of medicine. In my hometown country, Taiwan, medical professionals spend a minimum of six to seven years studying before they are granted certification. Many doctors continue to pursue further education and training even after completing their formal studies, which underscores their dedication to staying up-to-date with the latest medical advancements. This level of expertise and commitment is crucial in ensuring that patients receive accurate diagnoses and appropriate treatment. Moreover, when patients consult doctors, they contribute to a body of knowledge that can be shared with others facing similar health issues.

One of the significant disadvantages of relying solely on alternative treatments is the potential for adverse side effects. Without the guidance of medical professionals or the support of empirical evidence from academic research, individuals may unknowingly expose themselves to unnecessary risks. Some alternative medicines and treatments may not be regulated by government health agencies, resulting in fluctuating prices and the risk of expired or counterfeit products. Widespread adoption of these alternatives could undermine the integrity of our healthcare system and jeopardize individual well-being, ultimately forcing people back to conventional medical care.

In conclusion, while alternative medicines and treatment may have their merits in certain cases, they should not be regarded as a wholesale replacement for conventional medical care. Doctor’s extensive training equip them to make informed decisions about patient’s health, ensuring that they receive the most appropriate treatment. Thus, it is advisable to seek professional medical guidance when addressing health issues.

entry.title: Many manufactured food and drink products contain high levels of sugar, which causes many health problems. Sugary products should be made more expansive to encourage people to consume less sugar. Do you agree or disagree?
entry.content:
In recent times, people have been consuming more food than ever before, leading to potential health issues such as cancer or disease. Some individuals argue that increasing the prices of sugary products could discourage customers from excessive sugar consumption. However, I do not support this viewpoint and I will illustrate two underlying reasons in this essay.

Sugar manufactures primarily prioritize profit over health concerns. Placing the burden solely on these companies is not fair, as poor health can result from a variety of factors, including genetics, personal behaviors, habits, and environmental influences. It is acknowledged that the excessive sugar intake can contribute some illness like obesity, but raising the price of products will not deter consumers who have a strong preference for sugary drinks and sweets. Moreover, such a price increase could lead to economic and financial challenges for society. Instead, the government should consider implementing polices that mandate clear and informative labeling of nutritional content, enhancing transparency for consumers.

Another significant contributing factor is a lack of physical activity, which can lead to obesity or even cancer. This sedentary lifestyle becomes more prevalent as people age, contributing to various health problems. To address this, authorities should promote slogans like “three times a week at least 30 minutes” or offer health education programs to raise awareness among citizens. Engaging in regular physical activity not only decreases health problems but extends one’s lifespan. For individuals who claim they lack time for structured sports courses due to busy work schedules, research has shown that simple changes, such as walking ten thousand steps daily or opting for stairs over elevators, can serve as effective exercise.

In conclusion, raising the prices of sugary products may not be the most effective solution to combat health problems and could lead to unintended economic consequences. Instead, the government should focus on promoting physical activity through slogans or lessons. It is possible that sports can decrease the rate of health issues and span one’s lifespan.

entry.title: The diagram illustrates how bees produce honey.
entry.content:
The given diagram shows the most important process of making honey which commences with making the hive and ends in storing the honey in the jars.

Initially, a bunch of bees has to build a container called a hive with a hexagonal shape. After building their repository of honey, they seek for nectar. Meanwhile, the blossoming plants release its fragrance which attracts bees. When bees find a suitable flower, they collect the nectar from it, which is used as the raw material to produce honey.

The nectar is taken back to the hive and then stored in its cells. This process may be taken time because there are a lot of cells in a hive. Subsequently, the bees flap their wings in order to generate the air to cool it down. As a result, the nectar loses it water content and then finally, the honey is produced. Ultimately, the collected honey is stored and packed in jars to be delivered to the markets.

entry.title: Some people think that government should strictly control the supply of fresh water, as it is a limited resource, while others it should not be regulated.
entry.content:
For human beings, water is an indispensable and essential resource in the worldwide and its quality would have enormous impact on our health. While some individuals argue that it should not be governed by authorities, I believe there are more compelling reasons for the government to regulate water resources to ensure stability and high quality.

To begin with, one of the primary reasons for advocating government regulation of water is to prevent negative consequences. For instance, irresponsible factories may neglect environmental protection measures, leading to water pollution and irreversible damage to the environment. Without proper management, we might end up consuming contaminated water, which could result in health issues such as diarrhea. Furthermore, continuous monitoring of water quality and maintenance of water tanks require substantial financial investment and human resources.

Instead of relaying solely on self-regulation, the government should enact strict laws to control the supply of water. To illustrate, imposing severe penalties, such as life imprisonment, on those who pollute water sources would deter potential offenders. Governments should allocate funds for the development of advanced monitoring systems that track water quality, acidity, and remaining volume on a daily basis. These data should be made publicly accessible through a website to ensure transparency and allow people to make informed decisions about their water consumption.

In conclusion, the lack of regulations could lead to the consumption of unsafe water. It is essential for the government to take proactive measures to regulate the supply of fresh water to safeguard public health and the environment.

entry.title: Television cannot replace the book as a learning tool, which is why children are less well educated today. Do you agree or disagree?
entry.content:
The Internet and television have become major tools for children to acquire new knowledge or materials. Some individuals argue that these tools have an adverse impact on children because they might replace the book. However, the benefits of television outweigh its drawbacks.

Television offers various educational contents. Since the advent of the Internet, programs can be access with different sources, such as Discovery and BBC. Children have the opportunity to learn about creatures in various environments, from scorching hot deserts to the extremely cold Arctic Circle via television programs. The educational programs offer the most authentic English from native speakers at BBC Learning English. These meaningful videos, they not only stimulate our learning motivation but they broaden our horizons without traveling abroad.

In addition, television programs can be digitally preserved regardless of weather or environmental conditions and stored permanently once it is uploaded to Google Drive or Dropbox. When we have enormous videos and materials on the Internet, tackling the challenge of effective search become crucial. Thanks to advanced algorithms, data retrieval has becomes nearly instantaneous, which makes it possible to spread the knowledge with efficiency. To illustrate, Youtube, as one of the primary platforms, hosts immense videos or movies, and basic keywords are usually sufficient to cater individual needs.

Proponents of traditional books often argue that they are irreplaceable due to the printed format. However, it is widely acknowledged that paper manufacturing, which involves the felling of numerous trees, contributes to the acceleration of global warming. Conversely, physical books have their drawbacks as they lack durability and are susceptible to moisture and dirt.

In conclusion, television can replace the books due to their educational contents, durability. It is possible that the digital of transmission of knowledge could replace the traditional methods in near future with its substantial advantages.
